channel.title: [317] Mino-Scape v1.0 [317]
channel.description:
Hello, I am 20% with making my server, So I'm going to make this v1.0.
Server Description: This server is a 317 server made from the base elite-pkz. There are no commands as soon as I think commands ruin the whole point of copying Runescape. I hope you enjoy this source!
Download: http://uppit.com/v/HB8WAKKU (Source and client in one .rar.)
[center][size=14pt][center]Pictures:[/center] Barrows: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/barrows.png[/img] Not enough for you? View this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w2vu3LiOinU
Pest Control: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Pestcontrol2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/pestcontrol3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/pestcontrol4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/pestcontrol5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/pestcontrol6.png[/img]
Donator Shop: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/doantorshop3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/doantorshop4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/doantorshop1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/doantorshop2.png[/img]
Customs: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Customwhips2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Customitems-1.png[/img] + all of bluurrs client.
Some NPC: Goblins at home [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/goblins2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/goblins.png[/img] White knights: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/Whiteknights1.png[/img] Green drags: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Greendrags-1.png[/img] Ogres: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/orge1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/orge2.png[/img] Guards: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Guards-1.png[/img] Tzhaars: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/bankatjadslair.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Droptokkul.png[/img]
Jad: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Jadwave3-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/JAd.png[/img] (Ignore the 2nd dialogue box.) New version: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Newtzhaar.png[/img]
Bank: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Homebank-1.png[/img]
New logout: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Logout.png[/img]
Slayer: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Slayer1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/slayer2.png[/img] Diamond thing: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Slayer3.png[/img]
Rock Crabs: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Rockcrabs.png[/img]
Quest tab: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Questtab2.png[/img]
Pking Interface (As we all know it) [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/pkingmap.png[/img] New style from King-Tren My good friend.
Tutorial Island: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/hans2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/sirlacelot.png[/img] [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/sirlacelot2.png[/img]
When you hit 99 on combat skill you get skill cape automatic: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/Skillcapes.png[/img]
General Store: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/shopathome2.png[/img] (With sharks)
Shield Shop: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/ShieldShop.png[/img]
Re-Heal Prayer: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/prayerthingathome.png[/img]
Hans (After tut land): [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/hans.png[/img]
Camelot Teleport Guy: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/camelot2.png[/img]
And many Bug Fixes: [IMG]http://i785.photobucket.com/albums/yy139/minoroin/RS/craft.png[/img] [/center]
[center]Download: http://uppit.com/v/HB8WAKKU (Source and client in one .rar.) [/center] [center]Credits: Elite-Pkz - For Base: 40% Bluurrs - For Client: 10% Me - For scripting server: 40% Friends - For help: 10%[/center]
[center]If you feel this is incorrect, Please comment below saying so.[/center]

item.title: [317] Mino-Scape v1.0 [317]
item.dc:creator: @kingtren kingtren
item.description:
@kingtren wrote:

Anyone who has the nerve to flame this post about glitches is an idiot. If there are glitches they can be fixed put your ass to work and stfu. And if you dont wanna do the work then get the hell off the post because all you want is a quick source to leech. For those of you who are here to tell him he fails, Sucks, Or can’t code. You should probably swallow a bullet, and do the whole world the favor of killing yourself. At least he made his shot at making this server. And as far as im concerned for only being 20% done Congratz on a job well done. For the rest of you trollers, and flamers. get off this post.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Mino-Scape v1.0 [317]
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

[quote=“minoroin, post:1, topic:330371”]Server Description:
This server is a 317 server made from the base elite-pkz. There are no commands as soon as I think commands ruin the whole point of copying Runescape. I hope you enjoy this source![/quote]
I think that there should be commands because why would you copy Runescape if you play a Runescape Private Server. Most people leave Runescape because it gets boring, so a server copying Runescape would be worse than Runescape with all the bugs/glitches/etc. You might as well remove custom edits for items if you’re trying to copy Runescape.

kthnxbaijustrandomstuffcuzimboredlulwut.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Mino-Scape v1.0 [317]
item.dc:creator: @CodysCoding CodysCoding
item.description:
@CodysCoding wrote:

Cody says:
Hey
I am a 317 coder
Tom says:
Hello, How may I help you?
Hello.
Cody says:
From Mopar
I am the owner of CodyScape
From like 3 years ago
Biggest hit
Had over 90k downloads 142k views
Tom says:
Ok, Im sorry never heard of it.
Cody says:
With over 5years experience in coding
Tom says:
Were ok for Java Scripters at the moment, thank you.
Cody says:
Omfg, This is funny.
How old are you kid?
What are you like a 13 year old Customer Service
Lol
Tom says:
Chould I ask why?
Cody says:
Lmfao
Your funny
Chould is Could
Tom says:
Very good, Thank well. Sorry you can’t be scripter Bye Bye!
Cody said (2:49 PM):
Lmfao
Funny Kid
Cody said (2:50 PM):
You need the help. Your Source sucks.

Jlstepper, Why. Why, would I waste the time of trying to fix a source the from the start sucks.

There is to much stuff to fix. It would take longer then the time he spent messing it up.

Read full topic
